def list_faces(self, max_results): """ Lists the faces currently indexed in the collection.
:param max_results: The maximum number of faces to return. :return: The list of faces in the collection. """ try: response = self.rekognition_client.list_faces( CollectionId=self.collection_id, MaxResults=max_results) faces = [RekognitionFace(face) for face in response['Faces']] logger.info( "Found %s faces in collection %s.", len(faces), self.collection_id) except ClientError: logger.exception( "Couldn't list faces in collection %s.", self.collection_id) raise else: return faces
